sentences.en: 1879 -- George Selden's patent for a " gasoline carriage " granted.
sentences.cn: 1879年 —— 乔治-塞尔登获 “ 汽油发动机汽车 ” 专利.

sentences.en: a patent lock
sentences.cn: 专利锁

sentences.en: A patent right is an exclusive right to an invention.
sentences.cn: 专利权就是发明的专有权.

sentences.en: As soon as the patent was filed for, Vespas began production in 1946.
sentences.cn: 伟士牌一申请到专利, 便于1946年开始生产.

sentences.en: Do you handle cases of patent and trademark infringement?
sentences.cn: 你们受理专利和商标侵权的案件 吗 ?

sentences.en: He held a number of patents for his many innovations.
sentences.cn: 他为他的许多革新申请了几项专利。

sentences.en: He patented the idea that the atom could be split.
sentences.cn: 他得到了原子可以分裂的这个见解的专利。

sentences.en: He wants to take out a patent on his new type of dustbin.
sentences.cn: 他想为他的新型垃圾桶取得专利。

sentences.en: He wore patent leather shoes.
sentences.cn: 他穿着漆皮鞋。

sentences.en: If the fees are not paid, then the patent is said to have lapsed.
sentences.cn: 如果不付专利费, 这项专利就告失效.

sentences.en: It sued Centrocorp for patent infringement.
sentences.cn: 它诉Centrocorp公司侵犯专利权。

sentences.en: One who owns the patent right enjoys the exclusive right to exploit it.
sentences.cn: 持专利权的人享有实施这项专利的绝对权力.

sentences.en: P&G applied for a patent on its cookies.
sentences.cn: 宝洁公司为它的饼干申请专利权。

sentences.en: The drugs are protected by patent.
sentences.cn: 这些药品受专利保护。

sentences.en: The patent for this process was awarded in 1922.
sentences.cn: 此方法在1922年获得专利.

sentences.en: The patent runs out in three years'time.
sentences.cn: 这项专利期限为三年.

sentences.en: The trademark is registered on the book of the Patent Office.
sentences.cn: 该商标已在专利局登记注册.

sentences.en: This is a fact patent to the world.
sentences.cn: 这是全世界都明白的事实.

sentences.en: This was patent nonsense.
sentences.cn: 这明显是胡说八道。

sentences.en: Try some of this new patent medicine.
sentences.cn: 试试这一种新的专利药品吧.

words.tran_cn: 专利的,获得专利保护的,特许的
显然的,公开的,确定的,明显的,不容置疑的,真实的
专利,专利权,商标,专利证,特权
发明,创造,成果,产品,工序,进程,方法
注册,取得专利权,给予专利权,发明,创造

专利代理；专利代理机构
代理人，专利代理人；专利律师；特许弁护士
动脉导管未闭；开放性动脉导管
专利联营；专利权共享互用的一组企业

trans.tran_cn: 有专利的，专利生产的，明显的

trans.tran_en: a special document that gives you the right to make or sell a new  invention  or product that no one else is allowed to copy
a special document that gives you the right to make or sell a new  invention  or product that no one else is allowed to copy
to obtain a special document giving you the right to make or sell a new  invention  or product
